_setBorrowCapGuardian(address).notice: Admin function to change the Borrow Cap Guardian

_setCloseFactor(uint256).notice: Sets the closeFactor used when liquidating borrows

_setCollateralFactor(address,uint256).notice: Sets the collateralFactor for a market

_setMarketBorrowCaps(address[],uint256[].notice: Set the given borrow caps for the given qiToken markets. Borrowing that brings total borrows to or above borrow cap will revert.

_setPauseGuardian(address).notice: Admin function to change the Pause Guardian

_setPriceOracle(address).notice: Sets a new price oracle for the comptroller

_setRewardSpeed(uint8,address,uint256).notice: Set reward speed for a single market

_supportMarket(address).notice: Add the market to the markets mapping and set it as listed

borrowAllowed(address,address,uint256).notice: Checks if the account should be allowed to borrow the underlying asset of the given market

borrowVerify(address,address,uint256).notice: Validates borrow and reverts on rejection. May emit logs.

checkMembership(address,address).notice: Returns whether the given account is entered in the given asset

claimReward(uint8,address).notice: Claim all the benqi accrued by holder in all markets

claimReward(uint8,address,address[]).notice: Claim all the benqi accrued by holder in the specified markets

claimReward(uint8,address[],address[],bo.notice: Claim all Benqi or Avax  accrued by the holders

enterMarkets(address[]).notice: Add assets to be included in account liquidity calculation

exitMarket(address).notice: Removes asset from sender's account liquidity calculation

getAccountLiquidity(address).notice: Determine the current account liquidity wrt collateral requirements

getAssetsIn(address).notice: Returns the assets an account has entered

getHypotheticalAccountLiquidity(address,.notice: Determine what the account liquidity would be if the given amounts were redeemed/borrowed

liquidateBorrowAllowed(address,address,a.notice: Checks if the liquidation should be allowed to occur

liquidateBorrowVerify(address,address,ad.notice: Validates liquidateBorrow and reverts on rejection. May emit logs.

liquidateCalculateSeizeTokens(address,ad.notice: Calculate number of tokens of collateral asset to seize given an underlying amount

mintAllowed(address,address,uint256).notice: Checks if the account should be allowed to mint tokens in the given market

mintVerify(address,address,uint256,uint2.notice: Validates mint and reverts on rejection. May emit logs.

redeemAllowed(address,address,uint256).notice: Checks if the account should be allowed to redeem tokens in the given market

redeemVerify(address,address,uint256,uin.notice: Validates redeem and reverts on rejection. May emit logs.

repayBorrowAllowed(address,address,addre.notice: Checks if the account should be allowed to repay a borrow in the given market

repayBorrowVerify(address,address,addres.notice: Validates repayBorrow and reverts on rejection. May emit logs.

seizeAllowed(address,address,address,add.notice: Checks if the seizing of assets should be allowed to occur

seizeVerify(address,address,address,addr.notice: Validates seize and reverts on rejection. May emit logs.

transferAllowed(address,address,address,.notice: Checks if the account should be allowed to transfer tokens in the given market

transferVerify(address,address,address,u.notice: Validates transfer and reverts on rejection. May emit logs.

_grantQi(address,uint256).details: Note: If there is not enough BENQI, we do not perform the transfer all.

params.amount: The amount of BENQI to (possibly) transfer
params.recipient: The address of the recipient to transfer BENQI to

params.newBorrowCapGuardian: The address of the new Borrow Cap Guardian

_setCollateralFactor(address,uint256).details: Admin function to set per-market collateralFactor

params.newCollateralFactorMantissa: The new collateral factor, scaled by 1e18
params.qiToken: The market to set the factor on

_setCollateralFactor(address,uint256).return: uint 0=success, otherwise a failure. (See ErrorReporter for details)

_setLiquidationIncentive(uint256).return: uint 0=success, otherwise a failure. (See ErrorReporter for details)

_setMarketBorrowCaps(address[],uint256[].details: Admin or borrowCapGuardian function to set the borrow caps. A borrow cap of 0 corresponds to unlimited borrowing.

params.newBorrowCaps: The new borrow cap values in underlying to be set. A value of 0 corresponds to unlimited borrowing.
params.qiTokens: The addresses of the markets (tokens) to change the borrow caps for

params.newPauseGuardian: The address of the new Pause Guardian

_setPauseGuardian(address).return: uint 0=success, otherwise a failure. (See enum Error for details)

_setPriceOracle(address).details: Admin function to set a new price oracle
_setPriceOracle(address).return: uint 0=success, otherwise a failure (see ErrorReporter.sol for details)

params.qiToken: The market whose reward speed to update

_supportMarket(address).details: Admin function to set isListed and add support for the market

params.qiToken: The address of the market (token) to list

_supportMarket(address).return: uint 0=success, otherwise a failure. (See enum Error for details)

params.borrowAmount: The amount of underlying the account would borrow
params.borrower: The account which would borrow the asset
params.qiToken: The market to verify the borrow against

borrowAllowed(address,address,uint256).return: 0 if the borrow is allowed, otherwise a semi-opaque error code (See ErrorReporter.sol)

params.borrowAmount: The amount of the underlying asset requested to borrow
params.qiToken: Asset whose underlying is being borrowed

params.account: The address of the account to check

checkMembership(address,address).return: True if the account is in the asset, otherwise false.

params.holder: The address to claim BENQI for
The address to claim BENQI for
params.qiTokens: The list of markets to claim BENQI in

params.borrowers: Whether or not to claim AVAX earned by borrowing
params.holders: The addresses to claim AVAX for
params.qiTokens: The list of markets to claim AVAX in
params.suppliers: Whether or not to claim AVAX earned by supplying

params.qiTokens: The list of addresses of the qiToken markets to be enabled

enterMarkets(address[]).return: Success indicator for whether each corresponding market was entered

exitMarket(address).details: Sender must not have an outstanding borrow balance in the asset, or be providing necessary collateral for an outstanding borrow.

params.qiTokenAddress: The address of the asset to be removed

exitMarket(address).return: Whether or not the account successfully exited the market

getAccountLiquidity(address).return: (possible error code (semi-opaque), account liquidity in excess of collateral requirements,         account shortfall below collateral requirements)

getAllMarkets().details: The automatic getter may be used to access an individual market.

params.account: The address of the account to pull assets for

getAssetsIn(address).return: A dynamic list with the assets the account has entered

params.account: The account to determine liquidity for
params.borrowAmount: The amount of underlying to hypothetically borrow
params.qiTokenModify: The market to hypothetically redeem/borrow in
params.redeemTokens: The number of tokens to hypothetically redeem

getHypotheticalAccountLiquidity(address,.return: (possible error code (semi-opaque), hypothetical account liquidity in excess of collateral requirements,         hypothetical account shortfall below collateral requirements)

params.liquidator: The address repaying the borrow and seizing the collateral

params.qiTokenCollateral: Asset which was used as collateral and will be seized

params.actualRepayAmount: The amount of underlying being repaid

params.qiTokenCollateral: Asset which was used as collateral and will be seized

params.qiTokenBorrowed: The address of the borrowed qiToken
params.qiTokenCollateral: The address of the collateral qiToken

liquidateCalculateSeizeTokens(address,ad.return: (errorCode, number of qiTokenCollateral tokens to be seized in a liquidation)

params.mintAmount: The amount of underlying being supplied to the market in exchange for tokens
params.minter: The account which would get the minted tokens
params.qiToken: The market to verify the mint against

params.mintTokens: The number of tokens being minted

params.qiToken: The market to verify the redeem against
params.redeemTokens: The number of qiTokens to exchange for the underlying asset in the market
params.redeemer: The account which would redeem the tokens

params.redeemTokens: The number of tokens being redeemed

params.borrower: The account which would borrowed the asset
params.payer: The account which would repay the asset
params.qiToken: The market to verify the repay against
params.repayAmount: The amount of the underlying asset the account would repay

params.liquidator: The address repaying the borrow and seizing the collateral

params.qiTokenCollateral: Asset which was used as collateral and will be seized
params.seizeTokens: The number of collateral tokens to seize

params.qiTokenCollateral: Asset which was used as collateral and will be seized
params.seizeTokens: The number of collateral tokens to seize
